author: Cedric Canard
content:
Couldn't agree more. My current camera (a Sony A700 dSLR) is my last "big" camera I'll own. When it stops working I'll be getting something smaller, 4/3rd or maybe even just point&shoot. In fact I might just end up with a… gasp… phone camera. Ok, that might be going too far. Maybe.

Your last statement about Canon and Nikon, now that will be interesting to see how that pans out. I suspect you could be right.
